description.narrative: The project will launch basketball schools adn training for girls and young women in Somaliland first in Hargeisa and at later stage elsewhere in Somaliland. Those who attend the activities will also be given healtheducation. The project will promote the p articipation of girls in sports in general and make it acceptable in community. Before the civil war girls where able to enjoy sports. The current structures in society do not favor girls at school or in sportclubs. Needs of the girls are ignored and nobo dy wants to invest in them. Boys play and girls are (perhaps)watching the games. Or girls continue studies in classrooms while boys have sports.The project wants to make it possible that girls could attend sport equally. In this work we want to launch a ba skeball league for girls and give it some credit and visibility in media. By broadcasting the games we will raise the intrest of advertisers and sponsors to support our tournaments. In this way we will get financing from the private sector and eventually b e economically independent in the future.
